actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-708.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6786) to amend Public Law 96-432 relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of certain property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6786 (U.S. Capitol Grounds).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6786) to amend Public Law 96-432 relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of certain property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds.
